name: A Walk Along the Wall
description: A challenging & Lovecraft-inspired boss-rush top-down twin-stick shooter. Bosses of great scale and challenge. A small yet potent arsenal. A wickedly unique soundtrack. Go forth and kick their teeth in.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 300 series, Radean 5000 series, Intel HD400 series DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 850 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: 3GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 800 series or higher DirectX: Version 11
